body_html:
If the class new method returns an array, it needs to be called with a *:

let(:valid_attributes) { build(:user).attributes.except('github_id', 'avatar_url', *User.immutable_params.map(&:to_s)) }

# Or:

let(:immutable_attributes) { User.immutable_params.map(&:to_s) + %w(github_id avatar_url) }
let(:valid_attributes) { build(:user).attributes.except(*immutable_attributes) }
